# Resources Docs

## Concepts

- [ML.NET tasks](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/machine-learning/resources/tasks.md): Explore the different machine learning and associated tasks that are supported in ML.NET.
- [Data transforms](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/machine-learning/resources/transforms.md): Explore the feature engineering components supported in ML.NET.
- [Model evaluation metrics](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/machine-learning/resources/metrics.md): Understand the metrics that are used to evaluate the performance of an ML.NET model
- [Improve model accuracy](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/machine-learning/resources/improve-machine-learning-model-ml-net.md): Learn how to improve your ML.NET model

## Resources

- [Glossary](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/machine-learning/resources/glossary.md): A glossary of important machine learning terms that are useful as you build your custom models in ML.NET.
- [Azure training resources](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/machine-learning/resources/azure-training-concepts-model-builder.md): A guide of resources for Azure Machine Learning
- [CLI telemetry](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/machine-learning/resources/ml-net-cli-telemetry.md): Learn about ML.NET CLI telemetry features that collect usage information for analysis, which data is collected, and how to disable it. Also, find links to the .NET license agreement and information about Microsoft GDPR compliance.
